text: John Muir's High Sierra is a 1974 American short documentary film directed by Dewitt Jones produced by Dewitt Jones and Lesley Foster. It was nominated for an Oscar for Best Documentary Short Subject. ==See also== * List of American films of 1974 ==References== ==External links== * Category:1974 films Category:1970s documentary films Category:1974 short films Category:American films Category:English-language films Category:American documentary films Category:Short documentary films Category:American independent films Category:Documentary films about nature
title: John Muir's High Sierra
